question: FATF has decided to put which country in “Grey List” till February 2021?
explanation:
Financial Action Task Force (FATF) has decided to place Pakistan in its “Grey List” till February 2021. This decision has been made since Pakistan was not able to fulfill six out of the 27 mandates to check terror funding.
The Financial Action Task Force is an intergovernmental organisation founded in 1989 to combat money laundering and terror financing. It is headquartered at Paris.
